mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QnABoard ( user_id, title, content, created_date, updated_date ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW() );
mapper.select: SELECT q.qna_board_id AS qnaBoardId, q.user_id AS userId, q.title AS title, q.content AS content, q.created_date AS createdDate, q.updated_date AS updatedDate, u.user_name AS userName, u.email AS email FROM QnABoard q JOIN User u ON q.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY q.qna_board_id DESC

SELECT q.qna_board_id AS qnaBoardId, q.user_id AS userId, q.title AS title, q.content AS content, q.created_date AS createdDate, q.updated_date AS updatedDate, u.user_name AS userName, u.email AS email FROM QnABoard q JOIN User u ON q.user_id = u.user_id WHERE q.qna_board_id = #{qnaBoardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE QnABoard SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_date = NOW() WHERE qna_board_id = #{qnaBoardId}
